# virtfusion Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "virtfusion" {
  endpoint  = "example.com"
  api_token = "myapikey"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_token` (String) The API token to use for API requests.
- `endpoint` (String) The endpoint to use for API requests.
